From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He went to jump from the missiles from Unicron, but there wasn't much
time. He was cought in the shockwave, and was blown away. He strugled to
him feet and came back shooting 4 blasts at Unicron.

::DrillBit::

He was struck by the shots but kept coming. It would take more than
that. He fired of 24 rounds at Unitron.

::Dollon::

He was blasted right in the shoulder joint and his right arm fell off.
"Oh sh*t! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! My arm!"
In a panicked frenzy he rushes Unitron.
